title: Looking for a flex Team
body:
Hi guys I'm looking to make a flex team I'm currently bronze 1 in flex but gold 5 in solo, dont really care about ranks though :) just an attitude to play and be positive and be active is all that is needed.

equipment requirements are a working headset and discord

I will be adding more than 5 people and invite you all to a club in which we can all work from there the idea is to play as many as we can :) se you out there/

replies.body:
Hey 

love playing league up and down through bronze ranks tho... play every day looking some guys and gals to have some fun with in stead of solo que
Majority of players already in the club are silver and higher but with low flex ranks as long as you are willing to learn and have a positive attitude you are most welcome please add me :)
